name: npm-template-es2015-flow-jest
description: NPM Template with Flow and Jest

scripts.build: npm run build-babel && npm run build-export-flow
scripts.build-export-flow: find src -not \( -path '*__tests__*' -prune \) -not \( -path '*__mocks__*' -prune \) -name \*js | while read filename; do cp $filename build/${filename##src/}.flow; done
scripts.browser-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -s projectName -t [ babelify ]
scripts.browser-watch: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/index.js -v -o dist/browser.js -s projectName -t [ babelify ]
scripts.browser: npm run browser-dev && uglifyjs dist/browser.js -o dist/browser.min.js -c
